name: FMJ Games Down to Earth
description:
Player 1 uses W, A, D, S to move and left shift to attack.

Player 2 uses the arrow keys on the same keyboard and right shift to attack.

Battle enemies and each other to see is the best! Player 1 is Max named after my cat and player 2 is Rocky named after my dog!

The theme was "Down to Earth" so I used plants and mossy terrain in the levels from Quixel megascans and I used character art from Paragon, a game that Epic released assets from for Unreal devs to use for free on the Unreal Marketplace.

Getting this game down to under a gig was tough. I had to cut the music, sound fx, and particles to get it down to size. If I ever released it for real I would add all those things back in :)

Thanks for checking it out! Feel free to download and play!

Please comment and let me know what you think!
